comments:
Build 20020205

If you try and self host JDT using the PDE import the JDT plugin fails its 
startup. I suspect that there is a new dependency that is not defined in the 
plugin as Eclipse itself works fine.

STEPS
1) Import org.eclipse.jdt.ui and all required plugins using the PDE import
2) Start Eclipse using the runtime workbench
3) Switch to the Java Perspective

You get the following errors:

Verified that importing the entire build works fine.

In my case I was trying to launch using j9 but I was missing the 
org.eclipse.jdt.launching.j9 plugin from my workspace.
This has been fixed (a duplicate bug).

traces.message: Problems encountered starting up plug- in: org.eclipse.jdt.ui.
